long_description: Shield your skin from harmful ultraviolet rays without sacrificing comfort thanks to the cool coverage of the Pistil Bocca Sun Hat. Breathable polyester/spandex fabric dries quickly and offers UPF 30 sun protection; elastic in the back ensures a comfortable fit. Sun cape shields your neck from the sun; adjustable chin cord keeps hat in place in windy weather. Pistil Bocca Sun Hat features a 3 in. brim.
short_description: Shield your skin from harmful ultraviolet rays without sacrificing comfort thanks to the cool coverage of the Pistil Bocca Sun Hat.
